    • isFromType

      public boolean isFromType(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.channel.ChannelType channelType)
      Compares a provided ChannelType with the one this event occurred on, returning true if they are the same ChannelType.
      Parameters:
      channelType - The ChannelType to compare
      Returns:
      true if the CommandEvent originated from a MessageChannel of the provided ChannelType, otherwise false.

    • getGuildSettings

      @Nullable public <S> S getGuildSettings()
      Gets the settings of the guild in which this command was run.
      Type Parameters:
      S - the type of the settings
      Returns:
      the settings, or null if either of the following conditions are met:
      • this interaction didn't happen in a guild
      • the client's GuildSettingsManager is null
      • the GuildSettingsManager returned null settings for the guild

    • getGuildSettings

      @Nullable public <S> S getGuildSettings(Class<? extends S> settingsClazz)
      Gets the settings of the guild in which this command was run.
      Type Parameters:
      S - the type of the settings
      Parameters:
      settingsClazz - the class of the settings
      Returns:
      the settings, or null if either of the following conditions are met:
      • this interaction didn't happen in a guild
      • the client's GuildSettingsManager is null
      • the GuildSettingsManager returned null settings for the guild
      • the GuildSettingsManager returned settings that are not assignable to the settingsClazz
